model.name: demo:model
model.description: This model is an example of custom content model
model.author: Abhinav

property.name: demo:originCreatedDate
property.title: Original Created Date
property.description: Created date of files based on incoming metadata extracted from metadata extractor

property.name: demo:originModifiedDate
property.title: Original Modified Date
property.description: Modified date of files based on incoming metadata extracted from metadata extractor
